name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency
storyline: The story is set in 1839 - 50 years after the events of the first part. Speedwagon, now CEO of a world-famous foundation, has located an ancient temple in Mexico that contains more stone mask and what looks like a carving of a man in a pillar. Meanwhile, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, Joseph Joestar, discovers he can also use Hamon, just like his late grandfather. But he doesn't know that because of the discovery in Mexico the whole world is in danger and that it's up to him to save it and discover more about the past.
summary: The second part of the JoJo's Bizarre RPG series. This game is based on the second major arc of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, and uncover the mysteries behind the origins of the stone mask, its creators and the history of Hamon.
